title: Chapter 1452 - A Striking Beauty In The Human Realm
body:
Chapter 1452 - A Striking Beauty In The Human Realm

A skeletal hand?

Mi Zhen seemed to understand. He laughed coldly, “So, this was your trump card all along.”

A frantic voice emanated from within the bronze box. “Fellow Daoist, I’m Qin Chongxu of the Epoch of Illusions. Our sect worships and reveres the Rahu Yao God. A long, long time ago, that woman plotted against me, sealing me within her skeletal hand. I humbly request your assistance, Senior!”

From beginning to end, Su Yi remained perfectly calm. He made no attempt to stop Qin Chongxu.

It was as if he were a bystander watching a trivial little farce play out.

“A worshiper of the Rahu Yao God…?” Mi Zhen’s eyes flashed. “Very well. While I’m at it, I’ll save your life.”

Boom!

Power poured from his fingertip and into the green lantern, which unleashed a streak of surging divine fire. Stinging and resplendent Laws of the natural order surged within the flames, making it far more terrifying than his last strike.

Su Yi’s “prison cell” instantly seemed to catch ablaze. As terrifying divine flames surged into the cage, a rain of snow-white light surged out of the bronze box, clashing with it head-on.

Boom!

A rain of light scattered, and the power of the Laws swept outwa...
original_title: Chapter 1452 - A Striking Beauty in the Human Realm
